profile.name: omar
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Disco Hello / Lizardcube
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented C++ developer with a strong passion for creating high-performance applications. Proficient in various open-source libraries such as Dear ImGui, SDL, and stb.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Disco Hello / Lizardcube
description: Led the development of multiple high-performance applications using C++ and Dear ImGui.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and within budget.
Continuously improved code quality, performance, and maintainability through rigorous testing and refactoring.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple open-source projects using C++ and various libraries such as glfw, soloud, and stb.
Contributed to the Dear ImGui project by fixing issues and pushing new commits.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source projects, including gpuvis, single_file_libs, and implot.
Ensured code quality, security, and compatibility across different platforms.
